page.title: 05LANGNEY SHOPPING CENTRE 2
page.content:
We asked 302 families who live in Hampden Park about Langney Centre. { { } These are the results: { {************************************** {* } Shop there once a week ....197{ * {* * {* }Shop there every 2/3 weeks..27{ * {* } {* {*} Shop there sometimes........50 {* {* * {*} Never shop there............28{ * {*} {* {*} Go there by own car........213 {* {*} {* {*} Go by bus...................56 {* {*} {* {*} Other ways of travelling.....5 {* {**************************************
By Dennis Gower & Suzanne Jones age 10
